name: 狠斗篮球
description:
Come and experience the fun of shooting and slam dunk!

Points mall, you can buy characters and basketball court skins.

Game mode: you can select practice mode, breakthrough mode and challenge mode. Let's start the challenge journey!

Practice mode, unlimited shooting practice, find the feeling of shooting.

Breakthrough mode: shoot from 5 positions, and all the shots are successful.

Challenge mode, choose an opponent to start the challenge!
